name: LD49 game
description:
Fix some bugs on the latest version.

This is a mini game about build and destroy.

To plays the game player should open the shop and buy the block and build as high as they can.

Press F to experience the disaster and countinue the game

......few more personal words to say,

this is our fist time participant a jam, 72h for 6 people, actually a huge challenge, communication, coop on the code, all the things are taugh but fun.

Still long way to go.
